participant_1.name: Samantha
participant_1.personality: Outgoing and sociable, enjoys social gatherings and has a fun-loving spirit.
participant_1.background: my favorite movie is mean girls. i'm a party animal. i am deathly afraid of heights. i help out at the food bank occasionally. i own a cat and a dog.

participant_2.name: Ethan
participant_2.personality: Thoughtful and introspective, with a passion for understanding human behavior and nature.
participant_2.background: i enjoy reading journals and guides related to psychology. my parents taught me survival skills. i am also a graduate student. i walk dogs for a living. i'm an avid kayaker.
